# Hono Routing

Hono's router is one of the fastest in the JavaScript ecosystem.

## Basic Routing

```ts
const app = new Hono()

app.get('/', (c) => c.text('Hello!'))
app.post('/posts', (c) => c.json({ ok: true }))
```

## Route Parameters

Use `:param` syntax for dynamic route segments:

```ts
app.get('/users/:id', (c) => {
  const id = c.req.param('id')
  return c.json({ id })
})
```

## Grouped Routes

```ts
const api = new Hono()
api.get('/users', listUsers)
api.post('/users', createUser)

app.route('/api', api)
```
